title: Anyone else's ping messed up?
body: NA and my ping is normally 79. For the past couple days my ping is 100-120. Today its 166. My internet is working fine. Anybody else running into the same problem? Server status is saying ok but I dont know how true that is

replies.body: Even if your net is working fine, your network can struggle reaching specific services such as our game server.  Start off with the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network, and test it in a custom!
Since Ornn patch, lot's of players, myself included get strange ping. No answer from riot for the moment.
